input.sentences: people observing a memorial that honors fallen soldiers .
cemetery is home to all the soldiers that lost their lives for the country .
these soldiers are preparing a flag for the fallen soldier 's family .
here is an urn that is used for the remains of a soldier .
bird house shows one of the soldiers favorite teams at his house .
output.sentences: At the cemetery there were some people observing a soldiers lives.
So many soldiers lost their lives to save ours.
Some soldiers were preparing for the funeral of another soldier.
There was a soldiers remains at this funeral.
The soldiers house had a bird house of his favorite team in remembrance of him.
